palette.title: wish u cool solstice
palette.description: wish you cool solstice || solstice as an astronomical event takes space on 21st december 10 | 23:38 h | gmt || the long winter nights | which are great to celebrate | last a bit longer || i would argue that they take place between 1st december and 1st february | around sixty nights of celebration || it is these long winter nights | which have been celebrated long before christmas or santa or new year were even thought of | i am refering to || these nights are for music | dance | tasting the fruits of paradise || happy nights COLOURlovers lovers || thank u 4 ur support || a [avilluk ljd (lukas jakob david) leu] | 04 dec 10 || 4 ur happy solstice | grey / gray shade | #E2D9DB | RGB 226/217/219 | HSV 347/4/89 | CMYK 0/4/3/11 | avilluk 4264 || solstice joy | metallic white | white shade | #F2E5F9 | RGB 242/229/249 | HSV 279/8/98 | CMYK 3/8/0/2 | avilluk 9427 || solstice lightness | cyan metallic | cyan shade | #D9E1DF | RGB 217/225/223 | HSV 165/4/88 | CMYK 4/0/1/12 | avilluk 4478 || solstice loving | red shade | #FF8A84 | RGB 255/138/132 | HSV 3/48/100 | CMYK 0/46/48/0 | avilluk 850 || wish u cool solstice | red shade | #FE6763 | RGB 254/103/99 | HSV 2/61/100 | CMYK 0/59/61/0 | avilluk 10572 || wish u cool solstice | avilluk 670 com | 04 dec 10 || ac click link
